15532234212.content:
Kirika felt her body warm up immensely. She let out a loud gasp.

"Kirika? What is it? Is something wrong?" Kyoko asked. She knew her formula worked, but Kyoko needed to know if her formula caused anything else to happened.

"My body..." Kirika exclaimed, "it's...AAHH!!" Kirika let out a loud yell, one that sounded to be in pleasure, as her body grew taller.

"Kirika's still growing!" Kyoko said. "It looks like my formula hadn't finished working yet."

Kirika grew and grew, let out moans of pleasure as she did. Instead of feeling scared, she felt excited. Now she was really becoming a 'Giantess'.

Her growth stopped when Kirika was 50 feet tall. "Wow!" Kirika cheered. "Now I'm really a giantess! I can see the whole school and everything from this high! I'm going to have so much fun!"

What happened next was...

155322342122.content:
"K-Kirika?!" a voice called out.

"What happened to you?!" another voice called out.

Kirika looked down to see that two people had arrived. Densuke Mifune and Chiharu Shinonome.

The second Kirika had seen them, she instantly want to have some fun. Kirika reached down towards Densuke and picked him up.

"K-K-Kirika!" Densuke cried out, becoming afraid of what Kirika was going to do to him.

Kirika brought Densuke up to her face and smiled. "At this size you look so small Densuke!" Kirika exclaimed. "You're like a toy to me! I think I'll play with you!"

Densuke panicked. He struggled to get out of Kirika's grip. "Kirika don't-" but he was cut off as Kirika placed the boy in her cleavage.

"We all know how much you love Chiharu's boobs Densuke!" Kirika exclaimed. "Well now you get to enjoy being between my huge mountains!" Kirika laughed as she walked away, the ground quaking from her every step.

Chiharu turned her attention to Kyoko. "Kyoko what happened?! How did Kirika get so big?!" she asked.

Kyoko sighed and told Chiharu everything. Once Chiharu understood what had happened, she nodded. "We need to catch up to Kirika and get Densuke back!"
---

info.brief_description: The girls from Eiken become giantess
info.description:
Make the girls from Eiken into giantess.

Nearly anything goes as long as the girls grow. The giantess can be gentle, or playful, or destructive. There can be more than one giantess. Crossovers from other series are allowed. Chapters must be at least a paragraph long, and have proper spelling and grammar.

I will not allow: Girls dying, toilet humor, male giants, TG, Futa, etc.

Feel free to add anything.

http://eiken.wikia.com/wiki/Eiken_Wiki
